 2021-02072021-03-26,  ,  PCH,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of MANDEEP ROSHI CHADHA of Westmount, Quebec, to be Vice-Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years.
AttachmentsAttachment
